summary: This module delivers the Plasmapy calculator functionality, supplying a command‑line entry point and a collection of helper utilities that parse arguments, launch the calculator subprocess, load property specifications, and dynamically assemble ipywidgets‑based interactive interfaces with unit handling and validation.
business_intent: Enable plasma scientists and engineers to perform plasma property calculations conveniently via a CLI tool or an interactive Jupyter notebook UI, reducing manual coding effort and ensuring consistent unit management.
